favourite.article: This tune was written by Lelia Naylor Morris for her hymn, "The Conflict of the Ages" in 1912. - cyberhymnal

His humanity enjoying bruises Satan each day! Let us stand up in Jesus in His full human life... Lord, make this our reality... the reality of the full grown man! His true image and dominion on the earth to express.
I love this hymn because it is my experience, and no one can argue with that. He is coming, He is coming!
